about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hi! I'm Benji, and my mobile barber shop is a unique place that combines luxury, professionalism, and convenience. I've been a barber since 2021, developing my skills through specialized barber courses and gaining valuable experience in a prestigious barbershop.
about.paragraph2: In October 2024, I created the first mobile barber shop in Wrocław and Lower Silesia, offering highest quality services at any location of your choice. Słoń Beniamin BarberBUS, I'm coming to you!
about.dorianParagraph1: I've been in the hairdressing industry for 11 years – starting from a hairdressing school, then moving to work in a renowned barbershop in Wrocław, where I really developed my skills. During this time, I regularly participated in training courses because I like to stay current and continuously improve.
about.dorianParagraph2: I feel comfortable with both modern cuts – scissors on top, clipper on the sides – and classic styles where I use only scissors. Precision, style, and good customer approach are what matter to me.
about.dorianParagraph3: I joined Barberbus on April 1, 2025 – now my scissors and clippers travel with me, and you can get a great cut wherever we are!
